description: This file sets up a knowledge base using Arxiv documents, creates an agent with this knowledge, and queries the agent about generative AI topics.

classes.name: ArxivKnowledgeBase
classes.description: A class representing a knowledge base built from ArXiv documents.

classes.name: PgVector
classes.description: A class representing a vector database using PostgreSQL with pgvector extension.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: A class representing an agent that interacts with the knowledge base.

methods.name: load
methods.description: Loads the knowledge base, optionally recreating the data.

methods.name: print_response
methods.description: Outputs the agent's response to a query, optionally formatted as markdown.
